entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
